    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main driver for the program
        Parameters:
        map - holds the values of the terrain
        t - object with the map of terrain
        remainder - tells how many tiles are left over after leveling the court
        start - holds the cordinates for the start location of the court
        section - holds the terrain for the section to become a court

      • smash

        public static int[][] smash(int[][] map,
                            int[][] section,
                            int startx,
                            int starty)
        Smashes the section back into the terrain map
        Parameters:
        y - the y cordinate in the terrain
        x - the x cordinate in the terrain
        Returns:
        the map object with the terrain

      • textToArray

        public static int[][] textToArray()
        turns the text input into an array
        Parameters:
        row - hold the row in text
        num - holds the individual numbers
        sc - scanns through the text file
        map - the map object holding the terrain
        y - y location in the terrain
        x - x location in the terrain
        Returns:
        map the map of the terrain

      • findSection

        public static int[][] findSection(int[][] map,
                                  int[] start)
        pulls section out of map
        Parameters:
        startx - the start location for x
        starty - the start location for y
        endx - the end location for x
        endy - the end location for y
        section - the section of the map to be leveled
        Returns:
        the section of the map to be leveled

      • sur

        public static void sur(int[][] map,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        prints the surrounding cordinates in map to a given point used for error testing
        Parameters:
        map - stores the terrain being eddited
        x - the x cordinate of the centerpoint
        y - the y cordinate of the centerpoint
